How do you make love !!!

"How do you make love to a woman" well this how I make love to a man.
How do you make love ,to a man?
How do you make love ,to a man?
Romantically and pastiently take the time to make love to his mind. Fulfill all of his midnight wishes.
Cover his entire body with soft kisses. Tell him,so that he will know! There`s no place on his body that your tongue will not go. And , when you love a man, You love him real slow. How do you make love to a man? how do you make love to a man? passionately and sincerely;
Let his sweetness become your weak ness.. Do not use just your body,But include your ear to listen to the sweet sounds of his moans and see what you hear..Feel the warmth and care of his loving embrace. Place your mouth on his and savor the taste.How do you make love to a man? How do you make love to a man,Sensually and honestly say what you mean and mean what you say? Tell him that you love him more and more with each passing day. Let all of the fantasies that dance in his head . Become his moonlight reality when its time to go to bed. Kiss and lick all over his body, until you find all his right spots. touch and caress his skin and make him real hot. Mutal satisfaction is a lovers plan. Love him cause you are inlove with him. He`s your man and your his woman , lovingly and completely love him until he " screams of passion"
is all you hear. lick on his neck and stick your tongue in his ear. Hold his soft tight body in the palm of your hands.Let his sexual wishes become your loving commands. Love your man with your mind, body and soul.He`s the most percious gift on earth.He`s worth his weight in gold.How do you make love to a man?
Theres only one true way to start. To make love to a man, just give your heart.
